showScoreExcerpt:
I laughed at the very first of the many silly sight gags… and was amused by the initial twist…I might have been won over by Jason Alexander’s Broadway directorial debut — had the production been 70 minutes long, tops. But long before the curtain call, not even the terrifically appealing cast…could dissuade me from seeing this ersatz 1920s British comedy of manners as a tedious two-hour exercise in comic overkill.
